response.original_title: 我時時刻刻都忍不住感覺到他在改變
response.overview: The director’s relationship with their mother was severed in the past due to their sexual orientation. In 2023, after the mother was diagnosed with cancer, the two reconnected. Through intimate moments with their partner, the director contrasts the closeness of their relationship with the emotional distance from their family. Struggling with both their identity as a queer person and as a daughter, the director uses the metaphor of a "Viewfinder" to capture the complex emotions between them.
response.title: In The Blink of an Eye
